statements: SELECT id, date, product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount, date, id FROM sales_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT product_name, id, date, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%';
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date, product_name AS product FROM sales_data ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' AND sales_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sales_id, sale_date, revenue FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_value > 100;
SELECT trend_name, trend_date FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_description LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT AVG(revenue) AS average_revenue, DATE_PART('year', sale_date) AS year FROM sales_data GROUP BY year ORDER BY year;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS sales_count FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_date > '2021-06-30' ORDER BY trend_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sales_Metadata
SELECT Sale_ID, Sale_Amount, Sale_Date FROM Sales_Metadata ORDER BY Sale_Date DESC
SELECT Customer_Name, Customer_Address FROM Customer_Master WHERE Customer_ID = 1
SELECT Product_Name, Product_Category, Unit_Price FROM Product_Inventory WHERE Unit_Price > 50

SELECT Sale_ID, Customer_Name, Product_Name, Sale_Amount FROM Sales_Metadata JOIN Customer_Master ON Sales_Metadata.Customer_ID = Customer_Master.Customer_ID JOIN Product_Inventory ON Sales_Metadata.Product_ID = Product_Inventory.Product_ID
SELECT Customer_Name, Customer_Phone FROM Customer_Master WHERE Customer_ID = 1;
SELECT Sale_Date, Sale_Amount FROM Sales_Metadata WHERE Customer_ID = 2 ORDER BY Sale_Date DESC;
SELECT Product_Name, Unit_Price FROM Product_Inventory WHERE Product_Category = 'Electronics';
SELECT Customer_Name, Customer_Address, Customer_Phone FROM Customer_Master WHERE Customer_Address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT Sale_Date, Sale_Amount FROM Sales_Metadata WHERE Sale_Amount > 1000 AND Sale_Date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE product_name = 'Product1';
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT person_name, department, hire_date FROM sales_personnel WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 AND sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT sales_data.product_name, products.category, products.price FROM sales_data JOIN products ON sales_data.product_name = products.product_name WHERE products.price < 50;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date = '2022-05-17' AND product_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY sale_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, product_id, sale_amount, customer_id FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM categories WHERE category_name = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC

SELECT s.sale_id, s.sale_date, p.product_name, c.customer_name FROM sales_data s JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id JOIN customers c ON s.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE p.category_id = 1
SELECT c.customer_name, c.customer_email, st.team_name FROM customers c JOIN sales_data s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id JOIN sales_team st ON st.team_id = s.sale_id
SELECT p.product_name, p.unit_price, SUM(s.sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM products p JOIN sales_data s ON p.product_id = s.product_id GROUP BY p.product_name, p.unit_price ORDER BY total_sales DESC

SELECT c.customer_name, c.customer_phone, st.team_name, t.team_lead FROM customers c JOIN sales_data s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id JOIN sales_team st ON st.team_id = s.sale_id JOIN (SELECT team_id, team_lead FROM sales_team WHERE team_size > 5) t ON st.team_id = t.team_id
